learning.supervised.meta.boosting

Class BoostableClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.Classifier
      • learning.supervised.meta.boosting.BoostableClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DWHFNNBoostable, HFNNBoostable, HIKNNBoostable, HwKNNBoostable

    public abstract class BoostableClassifier
extends Classifier
implements java.io.Serializable, Citable
    This class extends the usual Classifier class by introducing the instance weighting options to be used in re-weightable boosting procedures.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • setTotalInstanceWeights

        public abstract void setTotalInstanceWeights(double[] instanceWeights)
        This method sets the instance weights prior to model training. The weights correspond to the instance difficulty and relevance in the model.
        Parameters:
        instanceWeights - double[] of instance weights to be set.

      • setMisclassificationCostDistribution

        public abstract void setMisclassificationCostDistribution(double[][] instanceLabelWeights)
        This method sets the current label misclassification cost distribution for each instance. If x has the label y, then instanceLabelWeights[x][y] should be zero, as no additional cost is associated with the proper classification (that information is provided in the other instance weighting method, for clarity). In any case, such values will be ignored. As for the remaining weights, they should sum up to 1 for each instance.
        Parameters:
        instanceLabelWeights - double[][] of the cost distributions over labels for each DataInstance in the training data.
